definitions.definition: The set of all points in a given hyperspace that are at a given distance from a given point; a generalization of a sphere in four or more dimensions.
A zorb ; the act of zorbing , entering a zorbing ball, strapping into a harness, and rolling down a hill.

main_definition: ( geometry ) The set of all points in a given hyperspace that are at a given distance from a given point; a generalization of a sphere in four or more dimensions.
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) A zorb ; the act of zorbing , entering a zorbing ball, strapping into a harness, and rolling down a hill.
